it.unipi.cc.toretto.kmeans

Class KMeansHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unipi.cc.toretto.kmeans.KMeansHelper

  • public class KMeansHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Help to avoid code cluttering in the Main class Contains important methods that read and write centroids to files. Set initial centroids to Hadoop's Configuration

      • hasConverged

        public static boolean hasConverged(java.util.ArrayList<KMeansCentroid> newCentroids,
                                   float threshold,
                                   org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf)
        Check if the stopping criterion is fulfilled or not
        Parameters:
        newCentroids - gets the new centroids from the caller
        threshold - the constant value of the initial centroid set by the programmer
        conf - Hadoop's configuration
        Returns:
        returns a true of the shift of the centroids is less than the threshold already set by the programmer.

                                         org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf)
        THis method calculates the shift of centroids between each successive centroids.
        Parameters:
        newCentroids - These are the centroids in the current iteration
        conf - Hadoop's configuration
        Returns:
        returns the double value of the shift of the centroids

      • MapReduceWorkFlow

        public static void MapReduceWorkFlow(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf,
                                     java.lang.String INPUT,
                                     java.lang.String OUTPUT,
                                     int num_reducers,
                                     int max_iteration,
                                     float threshold)
                              throws java.io.IOException
        Does the iteration of the Kmeans algorithm in the mapreduce implementation
        Parameters:
        conf - Hadoop's configuration
        INPUT - the input file path taken from the terminal args
        OUTPUT - the output file path
        num_reducers - holds the number of reucers
        max_iteration - holds the constant value of the maximum iteration set by the programmer
        threshold - the threshold value to check for the stopping criterion
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there is an I/O error
